## BatchOperationsService.batchAutoClassify() method

Automatically classifies a batch of items. This operation returns an instance of 'BatchOperationCreationResult' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static batchAutoClassify(requestModel: BatchAutoClassifyRequest): CancelablePromise<BatchOperationCreationResult>;
```
